phase_name: Alpha Centauri B-C Link Discovery Mission
goal: Deploy slag-propulsion equipped scouting probe to discover and map the wormhole link between Alpha Centauri B and C, establishing navigation infrastructure for Proxima Centauri colonization.
description: Execute systematic wormhole discovery protocol using advanced slag-propulsion technology. Deploy autonomous probe from AC-B L1 depot network, conduct comprehensive gravitational anomaly scanning, establish navigation beacon network, and register wormhole claim under Anchor Law with Sabatier Offset inheritance.

mission_log.name: Phase 1: Probe Deployment & Systems Calibration (7 days)
mission_log.description: Launch slag-propulsion equipped scouting probe from AC-B L1 depot. Perform full systems calibration and establish autonomous navigation protocols for wormhole search operations.

objectives.name: Launch Scouting Probe
objectives.description: Deploy slag-propulsion equipped probe from AC-B L1 depot with full sensor suite

objectives.name: Systems Calibration
objectives.description: Complete full calibration of gravitational mappers, spectral scanners, and navigation systems

mission_log.name: Phase 2: Wormhole Search & Gravitational Mapping (120 days)
mission_log.description: Execute systematic search pattern for wormhole signatures between AC-B and AC-C. Conduct comprehensive gravitational anomaly mapping and multi-spectral scanning to identify potential wormhole endpoints.

objectives.name: Gravitational Anomaly Scanning
objectives.description: Map gravitational anomalies in the search volume between AC-B and AC-C orbital planes

objectives.name: Wormhole Signature Detection
objectives.description: Identify and characterize wormhole signatures using multi-spectral scanning

mission_log.name: Phase 3: Navigation Beacon Network Establishment (45 days)
mission_log.description: Deploy comprehensive navigation beacon network along discovered wormhole route. Establish stable anchor points and register wormhole claim under Anchor Law with Sabatier Offset inheritance.

objectives.name: Deploy Navigation Beacons
objectives.description: Establish 12 navigation beacons along the wormhole route for safe transit

objectives.name: Anchor Law Registration
objectives.description: Register wormhole claim with primary AC-B L1 depot anchor and secondary AC-C stellar anchor

mission_log.name: Phase 4: Data Transmission & Mission Verification (8 days)
mission_log.description: Transmit complete wormhole mapping data back to AC-B L1 depot. Perform final verification of navigation systems and prepare for colonization operations.

objectives.name: Complete Data Transmission
objectives.description: Transmit all gravitational maps, spectral data, and navigation coordinates to L1 depot

objectives.name: Navigation System Verification
objectives.description: Verify complete beacon network functionality and wormhole transit safety protocols

phase_completion_criteria.wormhole_discovery_verified: AC-B to AC-C link confirmed and mapped
phase_completion_criteria.anchor_law_compliance: Claim registered with Sabatier Offset inheritance
phase_completion_criteria.data_transmission_successful: Complete dataset delivered to L1 depot

phase_risks.wormhole_nonexistence: Critical risk - no link may exist between B and C
